item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Okay so I have this event …

public static void startHelpEvent() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { @Override public void execute(EventContainer event) { for (Player p: players) { // Update players. if (p == null || !p.online) { continue; } if(p.HomeArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Ask npcs for help around rimmington for information on training certain skills.."); } } } }, 60000); }

Now, all it does is if the player’s in the Home Area p.absY and p. absY it’ll send that message above… every 1 minute… now when I first tested it , it worked fine… it would execute that message ONCE… but sometimes when I run the server, and after 1 minute of waiting the message will appear twice, sometimes even 3 times… can someone explain to me where I’ve went wrong here?
